this readme is intended to share the environment I use.

## softwares
* apps
  * visual studio code
    * code spell checker
    * error lens
    * indent rainbow
    * trailing space
    * openapi
    * thunder client
    * html preview
    * markdown preview

* devs
  * docker
  * git
  * brew

* langs
  * python ( pyenv )
  * node ( nvm )

* clouds
  * amazon web service
  * google cloud
